text: Soni Allah agumbile chiumbe chilichose chakuulukutaga kuumila m’mesi. Sano ine mwa yalakweyo ikwenda chamakuku, soni ine mwa yalakweyo pana yaikwenda ni ngongolo siŵili, nambo soni ine mwa yalakweyo pana yaikwenda ni ngongolo ncheche. Allah akasagumba chaakusaka. Chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose aŵele Jwakombola
